body.name: Jayden 4-in-1 Mini Convertible Crib And Changer in Natural, Greenguard Gold Certified, Non-Toxic Finish, New Zealand Pinewood, 1" Mattress Pad
features: CONVERTIBILITY OPTIONS: The Jayden 4-in-1 Mini Convertible Crib and Changer grows along with your child. Starting as a crib, you can convert it into a mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately) . Its compact size makes it ideal for small spaces

GRACEFUL DESIGN: Built of New Zealand pinewood, it boasts minimalist design features- gentle, smooth arches and sturdy spade feet. It is available in 6 beautiful water based paints/non toxic finishes allowing you to mix and match with any nursery theme .

FEATURE-HEAVY CHANGING TABLE: The Jayden comes with a detachable 3-drawer changing table, equipped with a changing pad and restraining strap with an easy release buckle to keep your baby safely secured. Keep baby essentials handy and neatly organized in the 3 roomy drawers
MATTRESS COMPATIBILITY - Comes with 1 OEM Mattress pad. For additional aftermarket mattress purchase, we recommend any Dream On Me, non-toxic, Greenguard certified mini crib mattress.

PRIORITIZING SAFETY: All Dream On Me cribs meet/exceed applicable ASTM and CPSC standards Product dimensions are 56.75L x 29W x 41H inches Max weight limit 50 lbs All tools/assembly instructions included
body.description: Product Description The Dream On Me Jayden Convertible 4-in-1 Mini Crib & Changer effortlessly blends style with utility. It meets the growing needs of your child as it converts it from a mini crib to mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately). It also features a detachable three-drawer changing table. The mix of compact size and utility makes it ideal for smaller spaces. The changing table is equipped with a changing pad and restraining strap with an easy release buckle to secure the baby safely. NOTE: The changing table can be used as a standalone piece only in twin bed conversion mode. Keep baby essentials handy in the 3 drawers! Built of New Zealand pinewood, its minimalist design features gentle, smooth arches & sturdy spade feet. It comes in six striking non toxic finishes allowing it to blend beautifully with any nursery theme. It also has a convenient 3-position, adjustable mattress support system. Our mini cribs come with the regulatory one inch mattress pad and we recommend the Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for the perfect fit. All tools/assembly instructions included. All our cribs are designed with a focus on safety, and meet all applicable ASTM/CPSC standards. Product dimensions are 56.75L x 29W x 41H inches, maximum weight limit is 50 lbs. From the Manufacturer The Jayden 2 in 1 from Dream on Me is a beautifully constructed, rugged, multipurpose portable crib and changer. Comes standard with non dropsied rail system for safety, two level mattress support, 1" mattress pad and attached changing table with 3 large storage drawers. The changing table is equipped with a changing pad and restraining strap with easy release buckle to secure baby safely in place. It is the perfect alternative for small spaces without giving up fashion, function or safety. Once your child has outgrown the crib, the changing table is detachable and this portable crib can be converted to a twin bed with optional bedrails (sold separately). Accommodates a Dream On Me 3" portable crib mattress, (sold separately). Do not use power tools to assemble this product which can cause the wood to splinter. Tools required for assembly are included with the item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, true to color. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars was nervous due to other reviews
reviews.reviewText: We have a small space (fifth wheel trailer) that we needed this mini-crib for. Some of these reviews had us pretty nervous. We counted all our pieces before starting, and after that it only took my husband a little over an hour? to set up! It looks adorable and I actually don't feel that it's "tiny". It works for the purpose we intended. Foam mattress/pad for crib and changing table are of course cheap and flimsy, but what do you expect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect crib for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: This crib is great for small spaces. Assembly was fairly easy although some of the instructions did not make sense. We were able to figure assembly out and the crib is sturdy. The appearance is pretty nice but the railings don’t exactly match for the natural colored crib, they stand out a bit but not awful. The railings appear to be made of a more cheap material, not solid wood. We knew this is in fact a mini crib but be aware the sleeping space is small. Hopefully it works until baby is ready to transition to a bed. The changing pad is not a standard size, reviews stated many people had trouble finding an adequate cover. I recommend the brand Pobi Baby. While the Pobi Baby changing cover is not a perfect snug fit, it works well enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Quality and Customer Support
reviews.reviewText: This crib came with 9 very damaged pieces (scuffs, dents, writing on exposed areas of the wood, stripped stain). Per the instructions, I contacted the company for replacement parts and provided photos of the damaged pieces (more than what I have inclided in the review). I was advised they will only issue a maximum of 2 replacement parts and that replacement parts for this crib are hard to come by due to low inventory. I was advised to return and request a replacement from Amazon. I had already had one replacement prior to this due to the carrier at UPS leaving the crib out in the pouring rain (despite having a covered porch it could have been left on). I advised the company I would be returning the crib and purchasing another brand. The crib itself seemed on the cheapy side, but for the size and price I would have made it work if they were more accommodating. I liked the built in drawers, its unfortunate this model was so poorly made. Trying to stuff that crib back in the box was no easy task for the return either. Buying this crib was one big hassel. I will never buy this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product and Service
reviews.reviewText: One of the rails had a spilt in the wood when I received it. Got in contact with the company and they sent us a replacement part within a couple of weeks. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this crib
reviews.reviewText: The instructions on putting this crib together were very clear and I had no trouble getting it all set up without my husband, although I had to have my 7 year old help hold up a piece here and there. It's so cute and I love the way it's put together.***UPDATE*** 3 years, taking this down, moving it, putting it back together without instructions for baby #3, and it's still great. The only issue I've had was the tiny screws that hold the draw track on the side of the drawers like to come loose. I put some longer ones in to replace those, and have had no more issues. Would defnitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of parts! But it went together well.
reviews.reviewText: It took 2 hours to assemble but good instructions and it went together well. The bed is small and the mattress is very thin so we’ll need to order another mattress.
